short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Move the comment section to the side bar and add a scroll to recommended videos and comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the Comment Sidebar Extension for YouTube! Tired of scrolling through endless comments and recommended videos at the bottom of the page? With this extension, you can easily move the comment section to the sidebar, making it easier to keep track of everything while you watch. Additionally, you can now resize the comment box and recommendation box to your preference. Enjoy a more streamlined and customizable YouTube experience with just one simple installation. Try it today! (Note: This extension only works in the default view).
